job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pSoftware Engineer CpythonppAmerican Robotics is seeking a Software Engineer to help build software for our industrial drone system Scout This work would cover a variety of domains including simulation environments command and control image processing and roboticsnbspThis person will have the opportunity to contribute to a rapidly growing company on the verge of exciting commercial successppbrppResponsibilitiespulliDevelop and maintain drone simulation environmentsliliDevelop automated testing environmentsliliDevelop and maintain business logic software for drone and drone stationliliCollaborate with cross functional teams to support engineering projectsliulpbrppRequirementsppbrpulliA Bachelors or Masters or higher degree in a Computer Science Computer Engineering Software Engineering or equivalent fieldliliExperience developing software in robotics applicationslili3 years of professional experience building production softwareliliAt least 1 year experience with both C and pythonliliCurrent on modern C standards C 11  14  17liliExperience developing multithreaded softwareliliExperience with CI  CD tools such as JenkinsliulpbrppGreat AdditionsppbrpulliExperience with robotics simulation environments such as GazeboliliExperience developing robotics softwareliliDronerobotics enthusiast familiar with building and operating drones and other robotsliulpnbspppAbout American RoboticsppnbspppAmerican Robotics is a commercial developer of the first FAAapproved fullyautomated drone systems providing ultra high resolution aerial data to enterprise customers Through innovations in robot autonomy machine vision edge computing and AI American Robotics has created the next generation of drone technology a fullyautomated robotic data platform capable of continuous unattended operation Using this technology American Robotics provides enterprise customers with the ability to continuously monitor digitize and analyze their assets in realtimeppnbspp
